sn17.11:1.3: Idhaham, bhikkhave, ekaccam puggalam evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami:
sn17.11:1.4: ‘na cayamayasma suvannapatiyapi rupiyacunnaparipuraya hetu sampajanamusa bhaseyya’ti.
sn17.11:1.5: Tamenam passami aparena samayena labhasakkarasilokena abhibhutam pariyadinnacittam sampajanamusa bhasantam.
